channel.title: Localization is important to us. Wikia already has 8 new translations already WIP!
channel.description: Just the front pages for now. More translations later. Localization is important to us. The following languages are WIP for Wikia's front page (other places later): * German * Spanish * Portuguese * Arabic * Bahasa Indonesia * Filipino * Turkish * Chinese (Mandarin/Traditional) Your language not here? **Let us know below!** Speak another language **natively**? Only the front pages are locked -- anyone is welcome to hop on https://tol.wikia.com and help get some of our sub-pages translated ;)

item.title: Localization is important to us. Wikia already has 8 new translations already WIP!
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Just the front pages for now. More translations later.

Localization is important to us. The following languages are WIP for Wikia’s front page (other places later):

  • German
  • Spanish
  • Portuguese
  • Arabic
  • Bahasa Indonesia
  • Filipino
  • Turkish
  • Chinese (Mandarin/Traditional)

Your language not here? Let us know below!

blob.jpg912×665 158 KB

Speak another language natively? Only the front pages are locked – anyone is welcome to hop on https://tol.wikia.com and help get some of our sub-pages translated

Read full topic
item.source: Localization is important to us. Wikia already has 8 new translations already WIP!
